items.sentence: Do you think Boston is a dangerous place to live?
Tom's behaviour is unpredictable when he's drunk.
Tom said he didn't want to sleep in the basement.
I thought that I told you not to do that anymore.
Don't you think that it would be wise to do that.
Let's play something that everybody can dance to.
My brother and I take turns cleaning our bedroom.
Tom pulled Mary into his arms and held her close.
Unless I'm mistaken, I've seen that woman before.
We all got in Tom's van and headed for the beach.
